Meet the Bugatti Chiron, that is if you have $2.5 million to spare

article_metadata.news-keywords: WeWork, Buro Group, Buro MiMo, Made at the Citadel, Pipeline, Pipeline Brickell, The LAB Miami, co-working, coworking, entrepreneurship, 360Spaces, Building, Pipeline Coral Gables, Buro Coconut Grove
article_metadata.description: Co-working spaces are continuing to proliferate, and co-working networks are beginning to take shape. With locations around the world, WeWork is opening its first South Florida location in Miami Beach this week.
article_metadata.title: Sharing space: South Florida co-working centers proliferate | Miami Herald
